entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
